name: execute-write-command
description: Execute a write CLI command (create, update, delete, add, remove). Use discover-commands first. Destructive commands require explicit confirmation.

command.description: CLI command path (e.g., 'person create', 'list entry add', 'note delete')

confirm.description: Required true for destructive commands (delete, remove). Automatically appends --yes to CLI.

dryRun.description: If true, return the command that would be executed without running it.
